text.en: When Lord Nāgārjuna teaches the excellent path
text.en-trans: namzhik pal gyi ri la ludrub jé

text.en: Of the Middle Way beyond extremes upon Śrī Parvata
text.en-trans: kalden düpé tsok kyi yong kor né

text.en: Surrounded by an assembly of the fortunate
May I be born as the very first among his retinue.
text.en-trans: dak kyang khor gyi tokmar kyewar shok

text.en: At that time, with unrivalled discernment that gauges
The limits of the space-like reality of knowable things,
May I refute all false imitations of Dharma,
text.en-trans: chö tar chöpa tamché sün chung né

text.en: And reveal without error the Ārya’s true intent.
